pullRequest.title: Disambiguate Codestart and Extension codestarts in the doc
pullRequest.bodyText: Codestart is the tool, codestart is an item used by the the tool, an Extension codestart is example code for an extension.

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            == Writing an Extension codestart
          
          
            
            == Writing an Extension Codestart
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -53,36 +54,36 @@ Each codestart consists of:
 . A `codestart.yml` file
 . Optionally some templates which following a common structure and naming conventions
 
-== Where are the Quarkus codestarts located
+== Where are the Quarkus Extension Codestarts located
 
 * Quarkus core codestarts dir: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/tree/master/devtools/platform-descriptor-json/src/main/resources/codestarts/quarkus/core
-* Example codestarts directory: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/tree/master/devtools/platform-descriptor-json/src/main/resources/codestarts/quarkus/examples
+* Extension codestarts directory: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/tree/master/devtools/platform-descriptor-json/src/main/resources/codestarts/quarkus/examples
 
-== Writing a codestart with example code for an Extension
+== Writing an Extension codestart

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            "Extension Codestarts" is the name we gave to our Quarkus extension quickstart code generation system.
          
          
            
            Extension codestarts provide a personalized Quarkus getting started experience and really show the Quarkus breadth.
          
          
            
            "Extension Codestarts" is the name we gave to our Quarkus extension quickstart code generation system. It aims to provide a personalized getting started experience with Quarkus.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -8,11 +8,11 @@ This guide explains how to create and configure a Quarkus Codestart for an exten
 
 == Description
 
-"Codestarts" is the name we gave to our Quarkus quickstart code generation system. 
-Codestarts provide a personalized Quarkus getting started experience and really show the Quarkus breadth.
+"Extension Codestarts" is the name we gave to our Quarkus extension quickstart code generation system.
+Extension codestarts provide a personalized Quarkus getting started experience and really show the Quarkus breadth.

nodes.bodyText:
This sentence is confusing.
Codestart with an initial upper case is the system and all lower case is an item used by the tool? It would be nice if that is explained more clearly here
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -29,6 +29,7 @@ mvn io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin:create
 jbang cli@quarkusio create
 ----
 
+To disambiguate, we decided that, Codestart is the tool (the code generator system), a codestart is an item used by the tool, an Extension codestart is example code for an extension.

commit.message:
Disambiguate Codestart and Extension codestarts
Codestart is the tool, codestart is an item used by the the tool, an Extension codestart is codestart example code for an extension.

Co-authored-by: George Gastaldi <gegastaldi@gmail.com>

afterCommit.message:
Disambiguate Codestart and Extension codestarts
Codestart is the tool, codestart is an item used by the the tool, an Extension codestart is codestart example code for an extension.

Co-authored-by: George Gastaldi <gegastaldi@gmail.com>
